subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : reactions are 'stereospecific', indicating that they result in the formation of only one stereo-isomer as the product. Statement (II) : reactions generally result in the options given below :

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(2) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(3) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
